title: Bloomberg Markets: WebMD Agrees to Taken Private by KKR
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: WebMD Agrees to Taken Private by KKR
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tara Lachapelle Bloomberg Deals Columnist Bloomberg Gadfly Discussing WebMD Health Corp. agreed to be taken private by buyout firm KKR & Co. for about $2.8 billion, five months after hiring bankers to explore a possible sale. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
